com.perples.recosdk

Interface RECOServiceConnectListener


  • public interface RECOServiceConnectListener
    The RECOServiceConnectListener interface receives the results when bind method is called.

    RECOServiceConnectListener 인터페이스는 bind 메소드의 실행 시, 결과 값을 전달받기 위한 인터페이스 입니다.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onServiceConnect()
      Method to notify that RECOBeaconManager instance is successfully connected to RECOBeaconService.

    • Method Detail

      • onServiceConnect

        void onServiceConnect()
        Method to notify that RECOBeaconManager instance is successfully connected to RECOBeaconService.
        In order to perform region monitoring and region ranging, RECOBeaconManager instance must be connected to RECOBeaconService.
        After getting this callback method, RECOBeaconManager can perform region monitoring and region ranging.

        RECOBeaconManager의 인스턴스가 RECOBeaconService 와 연결되었음을 알려주는 메소드.
        RECOBeaconManager의 인스턴스가 region monitoring, region ranging을 실행하기 위해서는 우선 RECOBeaconService 와 연결되어야 합니다.
        이 메소드가 호출된 후에 region monitoring, region ranging을 실행할 수 있습니다.
